issue.title: [CF 652] IncreasedStats doesn't include Legacy of the Emperor
issue.body:
I use an icon that's supposed to show up whenever I don't have the Mark of the Wild or equivalent buff, what you call IncreasedStats.  It works for Mark of the Wild and Blessing of Kings, but IncreasedStats doesn't seem to include Legacy of the Emperor from monks, at least in 6.0.3.

Here's the icon I'm using:

^1^T^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SIncreasedStats ^SEvents^T ^SOnFinish^T ^SAnimation^SACTVTNGLOW ^SPassThrough^b ^SInfinite^B ^t^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N1 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N60345^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user VgerAN | Imported from CurseForge issue #652 | Raw

comments.body:
Should be fixed in r628


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
